There are more NPEs. I also noticed on in WorkbenchPage#findView ...

After such NPEs the following serious behavior occur:
- I can't close views anymore
- I can't close perspectives anymore

The problem also seems to be related to perspective switching during debugging:
- perspective isn't switched anymore
- multiple instances of the "Variables" view are opened in the current 
perspective, some instances have an empty content (no control)
- I get exceptions for disposes widgets and disposed graphics (images)

I never saw any of those exceptions again in RC2. 
IMHO it's ok, to mark this as fixed.
